basic_info.description: .انا عمر قطام. محترف مسؤول عن العمل على عمليات التطوير الأمامية والخلفية. أقوم بتصميم وتطوير وصيانة منصات كاملة وعاملة مع قواعد بيانات أو خوادم👋

projects.title: Unlimited Art
projects.description: ART is one of the few websites which is like the idea.good UX means your site is enjoyable to use and functions properly.spreading knowledge about all kinds of art, giving as much daily updated information as possible about everything related to art, and selling all equipment related to art.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: create an application that displays images and information of horned animals. This application will allow you to filter the images by number of horns and chose your favorite image Using React.JS
